contents:
我媽： 特魯多老婆出現症狀 特魯多進入隔離狀態。
我和家裡的其他人：  Finally!!!  叫他不重視武漢肺炎, 這下不得不重視了吧! 早幹嘛去了。

我的學校將會停課， March Break之後還有兩周停課，已經確認了， 我看了YRDSB教育局的推特：
We have received notice from the Ontario Ministry of Education that all Ontario schools will remain closed for two weeks following the March break. All Ontario schools will be closed March 16 until April 5, 2020. Schools are expected to reopen Monday,  April 6. （https://twitter.com/YRDSB/status/1238195161794056192）

我希望大家能夠平安的度過這次疫情， 多洗手，少去mall.
